Function reference

Growth classification

Classify size for gestational age, stunting, wasting and under/overweight

classify_sga()
Classify size for gestational age using INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards (including very preterm)
classify_stunting()
Classify stunting according to WHO or INTERGROWTH-21st length/height-for-age standards
classify_wasting()
Classify wasting according to WHO weight-for-length/height standards
classify_wfa()
Classify weight-for-age according to INTERGROWTH-21st and WHO post-natal growth standards

INTERGROWTH-21st newborn size standards (including very preterm)

Conversion functions the INTERGROWTH-21st newborn size standards (including very preterm)

ig_nbs_percentile2value() ig_nbs_wfga_percentile2value() ig_nbs_lfga_percentile2value() ig_nbs_hcfga_percentile2value() ig_nbs_wlrfga_percentile2value() ig_nbs_fmfga_percentile2value() ig_nbs_bfpfga_percentile2value() ig_nbs_ffmfga_percentile2value() ig_nbs_zscore2value() ig_nbs_wfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_lfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_hcfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_wlrfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_fmfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_bfpfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_ffmfga_zscore2value()
Convert z-scores/percentiles to INTERGROWTH-21st newborn size values
ig_nbs_value2percentile() ig_nbs_wfga_value2percentile() ig_nbs_lfga_value2percentile() ig_nbs_hcfga_value2percentile() ig_nbs_wlrfga_value2percentile() ig_nbs_fmfga_value2percentile() ig_nbs_bfpfga_value2percentile() ig_nbs_ffmfga_value2percentile() ig_nbs_value2zscore() ig_nbs_wfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_lfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_hcfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_wlrfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_fmfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_bfpfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_ffmfga_value2zscore()
Convert anthropometric values to INTERGROWTH-21st newborn size z-score/percentiles

INTERGROWTH-21st post-natal growth in preterm infants

Conversion functions for the INTERGROWTH-21st post-natal growth standards for preterm infants

ig_png_value2zscore() ig_png_wfa_value2zscore() ig_png_lfa_value2zscore() ig_png_hcfa_value2zscore() ig_png_value2percentile() ig_png_wfa_value2percentile() ig_png_lfa_value2percentile() ig_png_hcfa_value2percentile()
Convert postnatal growth measures to INTERGROWTH-21st postnatal growth standards
ig_png_zscore2value() ig_png_wfa_zscore2value() ig_png_lfa_zscore2value() ig_png_hcfa_zscore2value() ig_png_percentile2value() ig_png_wfa_percentile2value() ig_png_lfa_percentile2value() ig_png_hcfa_percentile2value()
Convert z-score/percentiles to INTERGROWTH-21st postnatal growth standards for preterm infants values

WHO Growth Standards

Conversion functions for the WHO Growth Standards

who_gs_zscore2value() who_gs_wfa_zscore2value() who_gs_bfa_zscore2value() who_gs_lhfa_zscore2value() who_gs_wfl_zscore2value() who_gs_wfh_zscore2value() who_gs_hcfa_zscore2value() who_gs_acfa_zscore2value() who_gs_ssfa_zscore2value() who_gs_tsfa_zscore2value() who_gs_percentile2value() who_gs_wfa_percentile2value() who_gs_bfa_percentile2value() who_gs_lhfa_percentile2value() who_gs_wfl_percentile2value() who_gs_wfh_percentile2value() who_gs_hcfa_percentile2value() who_gs_acfa_percentile2value() who_gs_ssfa_percentile2value() who_gs_tsfa_percentile2value()
Convert z-score/percentiles to WHO growth standards values
who_gs_value2zscore() who_gs_wfa_value2zscore() who_gs_bfa_value2zscore() who_gs_lhfa_value2zscore() who_gs_wfl_value2zscore() who_gs_wfh_value2zscore() who_gs_hcfa_value2zscore() who_gs_acfa_value2zscore() who_gs_ssfa_value2zscore() who_gs_tsfa_value2zscore() who_gs_value2percentile() who_gs_wfa_value2percentile() who_gs_bfa_value2percentile() who_gs_lhfa_value2percentile() who_gs_wfl_value2percentile() who_gs_wfh_value2percentile() who_gs_hcfa_value2percentile() who_gs_acfa_value2percentile() who_gs_ssfa_value2percentile() who_gs_tsfa_value2percentile()
Convert anthropometric measures to WHO Growth Standards z-scores

Reference data and coefficients tables

Lists containing tables of reference values/model parameters for INTERGROWTH-21st and WHO standards.

ig_nbs
INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Standards (including very preterm) tables
ig_nbs_coeffs
INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards GAMLSS coefficients
ig_png
INTERGROWTH-21st Post-natal Growth Standards tables
who_gs
WHO Growth Standards tables
who_gs_coeffs
WHO Growth Standards LMS coefficients
